subject: Heisman Trophy
College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Auburn’s Cam Newton, whose father solicited money from Mississippi State in a pay-for-play scheme, said Thursday in an interview with ESPN that he never discussed payments with the university.
snippet: Auburn’s Cam Newton, whose father solicited money from Mississippi State in a pay-for-play scheme, said Thursday in an interview with ESPN that he never discussed payments with the university.
